General.Name: Miko NV
General.Description: Miko NV, together with its subsidiaries, owns and manages coffee services in Belgium, France, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom, Germany, Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, and Australia. It also places coffee and vending machines for companies, public institutions, and universities. The company offers a range of soft drinks, snacks, and healthy snacks, as well as milk, tea, and hot chocolates; and technical services. Miko NV was founded in 1801 and is based in Turnhout, Belgium.
